suite.name: Base

test.name: Cenario: DELETE Deletar usuario 200

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: DELETE On Session
kw.doc: Sends a DELETE request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios/sUDlMpdFTeRzq76c path_url=/usuarios/sUDlMpdFTeRzq76c headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: Setting list value to scalar variable '${response}' is not supported anymore. Create list variable '@{response}' instead.

test.status: Setting list value to scalar variable '${response}' is not supported anymore. Create list variable '@{response}' instead.
